thread.title: Ex-Olympian Oscar Pistorius released from prison
thread.title_full: Ex-Olympian Oscar Pistorius released from prison - KPTV - FOX 12

author: cbs8
title: Ex-Olympian Oscar Pistorius released from prison
text:
(RNN) â€“ Former Olympic athlete Oscar Pistorius has been released from prison and placed under house arrest.
Pistorius was serving time for fatally shooting his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, in 2013.
The defense in court contended Pistorius never intended to kill Steenkamp, but that he fired shots through a bathroom door, thinking she was an intruder.
A judge found him guilty of culpable homicide in 2014, saying he was negligent in Steenkamp's death, but that it wasn't intentional murder.
An amputee who ran on prosthetic limbs, Pistorius became known as the Blade Runner and competed in the 2012 London Olympics.
